activities: Personal data, in the form of email address, is provided to us through two methods: the use of our api to process one email address at a time, or through a bulk process which allows files containing potentially millions of email addresses to be uploaded to our service. Our process will check the validity of the provided email addresses and return additional information (non-personal).Any provided personal information is not stored within the system beyond processing unless the user decides to keep it there (for potential repossessing purposes).
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: Marketing prospect data, specifically email address. This includes data which is manually processed
